languages.text: Умно. Скрывшись с открытой местности, Жертва лишит меня превосходства моего дальнобойного оружия. Но я не дам ей сбежать — расправив крылья, я воспаряю над улицей и посылаю вслед Жертве длинные неприцельные очереди. Главное — не закончить все слишком быстро. Просительница хотела, чтобы моя добыча умирала долго.

Clever. By escaping from the open streets, the Prey has deprived me of the advantage of my long-range weapon. But I will not let it escape, so I spread my wings and soar over the alley, pelting the Prey with bursts of indirect fire. The chase must not end too soon. The Petitioner wanted my Prey to die slowly.
languages.original_text: Умно. Скрывшись с открытой местности, Жертва лишит меня превосходства моего дальнобойного оружия. Но я не дам ей сбежать — расправив крылья, я воспаряю над улицей и посылаю вслед Жертве длинные неприцельные очереди. Главное — не закончить все слишком быстро. Просительница хотела, чтобы моя добыча умирала долго.

languages.text: 賢い。獲物は開けた通りから逃げることで、私の遠隔武器の有利性を奪った。だが逃がしはしない。私は翼を広げ、路地の上空に舞い上がり、間接砲火を獲物に浴びせる。この追いかけっこはジックリと進めなければ。嘆願者は時間をかけて獲物の命を奪うことを望んでいるのだ。
languages.original_text: Clever. By escaping from the open streets, the Prey has deprived me of the advantage of my long-range weapon. But I will not let it escape, so I spread my wings and soar over the alley, pelting the Prey with bursts of indirect fire. The chase must not end too soon. The Petitioner wanted my Prey to die slowly.

traits.locale_text: 賢い。獲物は開けた通りから逃げることで、私の遠隔武器の有利性を奪った。だが逃がしはしない。私は翼を広げ、路地の上空に舞い上がり、間接砲火を獲物に浴びせる。この追いかけっこはジックリと進めなければ。嘆願者は時間をかけて獲物の命を奪うことを望んでいるのだ。

languages.text: 这是个聪明的决定。猎物逃出了开阔的街道，剥夺了我远程武器的优势，但我是绝对不会让它逃走的。我展开翅膀，飞过巷子，向猎物射出了一连串子弹，这场追逐决不能结束得太快，我的委托人希望猎物能在痛苦中慢慢死去。
languages.original_text: Clever. By escaping from the open streets, the Prey has deprived me of the advantage of my long-range weapon. But I will not let it escape, so I spread my wings and soar over the alley, pelting the Prey with bursts of indirect fire. The chase must not end too soon. The Petitioner wanted my Prey to die slowly.

traits.locale_text: 这是个聪明的决定。猎物逃出了开阔的街道，剥夺了我远程武器的优势，但我是绝对不会让它逃走的。我展开翅膀，飞过巷子，向猎物射出了一连串子弹，这场追逐决不能结束得太快，我的委托人希望猎物能在痛苦中慢慢死去。

languages.text: Muy lista. Al apartarse de las calles abiertas, la presa me ha privado de la ventaja de mi arma de largo alcance, pero no la dejaré escapar. Extiendo mis alas y me elevo sobre el callejón, acribillando a la presa con ráfagas de fuego indirecto. La persecución no puede terminar tan pronto. La solicitante quería que mi presa muriera lentamente.
languages.original_text: Clever. By escaping from the open streets, the Prey has deprived me of the advantage of my long-range weapon. But I will not let it escape, so I spread my wings and soar over the alley, pelting the Prey with bursts of indirect fire. The chase must not end too soon. The Petitioner wanted my Prey to die slowly.

traits.locale_text: Muy lista. Al apartarse de las calles abiertas, la presa me ha privado de la ventaja de mi arma de largo alcance, pero no la dejaré escapar. Extiendo mis alas y me elevo sobre el callejón, acribillando a la presa con ráfagas de fuego indirecto. La persecución no puede terminar tan pronto. La solicitante quería que mi presa muriera lentamente.

languages.text: Gerissen. Durch die Flucht von den offenen Straßen hat die Beute mich des Vorteils meiner Distanzwaffe beraubt. Doch ich werde sie nicht entkommen lassen, also breite ich die Flügel aus und schwebe über die Gasse, wobei ich die Beute mit indirekten Salven beschieße. Die Jagd darf nicht zu früh enden. Die Bittstellerin wollte, dass meine Beute langsam stirbt.
languages.original_text: Clever. By escaping from the open streets, the Prey has deprived me of the advantage of my long-range weapon. But I will not let it escape, so I spread my wings and soar over the alley, pelting the Prey with bursts of indirect fire. The chase must not end too soon. The Petitioner wanted my Prey to die slowly.

traits.locale_text: Gerissen. Durch die Flucht von den offenen Straßen hat die Beute mich des Vorteils meiner Distanzwaffe beraubt. Doch ich werde sie nicht entkommen lassen, also breite ich die Flügel aus und schwebe über die Gasse, wobei ich die Beute mit indirekten Salven beschieße. Die Jagd darf nicht zu früh enden. Die Bittstellerin wollte, dass meine Beute langsam stirbt.

languages.text: Malin. En s'enfuyant ainsi dans le dédale des rues, la proie me prive de l'avantage que me procure mon arme à distance. Mais il est hors de question qu'elle m'échappe, alors je déploie mes ailes et survole l'allée en la harcelant de salves indirectes. Il ne faut pas que la traque prenne fin trop tôt. La requérante a spécifiquement demandé à ce que la proie meure lentement.
languages.original_text: Clever. By escaping from the open streets, the Prey has deprived me of the advantage of my long-range weapon. But I will not let it escape, so I spread my wings and soar over the alley, pelting the Prey with bursts of indirect fire. The chase must not end too soon. The Petitioner wanted my Prey to die slowly.

traits.locale_text: Malin. En s'enfuyant ainsi dans le dédale des rues, la proie me prive de l'avantage que me procure mon arme à distance. Mais il est hors de question qu'elle m'échappe, alors je déploie mes ailes et survole l'allée en harcelant la proie de salves indirectes. Il ne faut pas que la traque prenne fin trop tôt. La requérante a spécifiquement demandé à ce que la proie meure lentement.

languages.text: Zekice. Açık alandan kaçan Av, uzun menzilli silahımın bana verdiği avantajı kullanmamı engelliyor. Ancak kaçmasına izin vermeyeceğim. Kanatlarımı açıyor ve oraya doğru süzülüyor, Av'ın üzerine dolaylı atış salvoları yağdırıyorum. Kovalamaca hemen sona ermemeli. Müracaatçı, Avımın yavaş yavaş ölmesini istedi.
languages.original_text: Clever. By escaping from the open streets, the Prey has deprived me of the advantage of my long-range weapon. But I will not let it escape, so I spread my wings and soar over the alley, pelting the Prey with bursts of indirect fire. The chase must not end too soon. The Petitioner wanted my Prey to die slowly.

traits.locale_text: Zekice. Açık alandan kaçan Av, uzun menzilli silahımın bana verdiği avantajı kullanmamı engelliyor. Ancak kaçmasına izin vermeyeceğim. Kanatlarımı açıyor ve oraya doğru süzülüyor, Av'ın üzerine dolaylı atış salvoları yağdırıyorum. Kovalamaca hemen sona ermemeli. Müracaatçı, Av'ımın yavaş yavaş ölmesini istedi.
